org.hari10.com.services

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hari10.com.services.base.BaseService<User>
      • org.hari10.com.services.UserService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IService<User>, IUserService, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService

    @Service(value="userService")
public class UserService
extends BaseService<User>
implements IUserService, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
    Service implementation for User. Besides providing all default methods it is also used in Spring Security login (implements UserDetailsService).
    Author:
    Ignas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
